name: alpha
use with: LCD, servo to drive AOA gauge

name: turnRate
description: actual turn rate (no delay or dampening) in degrees/second

name: aauz
description: AAU altimeter indicated altitude (new in BMS4)

name: RALT
description: Radar altitude (only valid/ reliable if MiscBit "RALT_Valid" is set)

name: cmdsMode
description: Ownship CMDS mode state, see CmdsModes enum for details

name: speedBrake
description: Ownship speed brake position 0 = closed, 1 = 60 Degrees open

name: speedBrake(g)
description: Ownship speed brake position 0 = closed, 65535= 60 Degrees open

name: DEDLine1f
description: First half of the Line 1 of the DED display

name: DEDLine2f
description: First half of the Line 2 of the DED display

name: DEDLine3f
description: First half of the Line 3 of the DED display

name: DEDLine4f
description: First half of the Line 4 of the DED display

name: DEDLine5f
description: First half of the Line 5 of the DED display

name: DEDLine1s
description: Second half of the Line 1 of the DED display

name: DEDLine2s
description: Second half of the Line 2 of the DED display

name: DEDLine3s
description: Second half of the Line 3 of the DED display

name: DEDLine4s
description: Second half of the Line 4 of the DED display

name: DEDLine5s
description: Second half of the Line 5 of the DED display

name: Invert
description: Marks inverted parts of the DED display
use with: DED/PFL (BMSAIT Win App uses this automatically)

name: ftit
description: Ownship Forward Turbine Inlet Temp (Degrees C)

name: ftit2
description: Ownship Forward Turbine Inlet Temp2 (Degrees C)

name: bullseyeX
description: Bullseye X in sim coordinates (same as ownship, i.e. North (Ft))

name: bullseyeY
description: Bullseye Y in sim coordinates (same as ownship, i.e. East (Ft))

name: DrawingAreaSize
description: The overall size of the DrawingData/FalconSharedMemoryAreaDrawing area

name: StringAreaSize
description: The overall size of the StringData/FalconSharedMemoryAreaString shared memory area

name: StringAreaTime
description: Last time the StringData/FalconSharedMemoryAreaString shared memory area has been changed - you only need to re-read the string shared mem if this changes

name: aft
description: Fuel quantity in aft tank in lbs

name: aft(g)
description: Fuel quantity in aft tank in lbs (Gauge position)

name: fwd
description: Fuel quantity in forward tank in lbs

name: fwd(g)
description: Fuel quantity in forward tank in lbs (Gauge position)

name: headPitch
description: Head pitch offset from design eye (radians) NB: these do not work when TrackIR device is enabled

name: headRoll
description: Head roll offset from design eye (radians) NB: these do not work when TrackIR device is enabled

name: headYaw
description: Head yaw offset from design eye (radians) NB: these do not work when TrackIR device is enabled

name: headX
description: Head X offset from design eye (feet)

name: headY
description: Head Y offset from design eye (feet)

name: headZ
description: Head Z offset from design eye (feet)

name: currentHeading(s)
description: Current Heading in a 0..65535 value format

name: instrLight
description: Current instrument backlight brightness setting, see InstrLight enum for details

name: iffBackupMode
description: IFF panel backup Mode1 all 4 digits

name: ralt_Valid
description: Indicates whether the RALT reading is valid/reliable

name: SolenoidStatus
description: 0 not powered or failed or WOW  , 1 is working OK

name: pilotsOnline
description: Number of pilots in an MP session

name: pilotsStatus
description: Status of the MP pilots, see enum FlyStates

name: pilotsCallsign
description: List of pilots callsign connected to an MP session

name: vehicleACD
description: Ownship ACD index number, i.e. which aircraft type are we flying.

name: latitude
description: Ownship latitude in degrees (as known by avionics)

name: longitude
description: Ownship longitude in degrees (as known by avionics)

name: PFLLine1f
description: First half of Line 1 of PFL

name: PFLLine2f
description: First half of Line 2 of PFL

name: PFLLine3f
description: First half of Line 3 of PFL

name: PFLLine4f
description: First half of Line 4 of PFL

name: PFLLine5f
description: First half of Line 5 of PFL

name: PFLLine1s
description: Second half of Line 1 of PFL

name: PFLLine2s
description: Second half of Line 2 of PFL

name: PFLLine3s
description: Second half of Line 3 of PFL

name: PFLLine4s
description: Second half of Line 4 of PFL

name: PFLLine5s
description: Second half of Line 5 of PFL

name: ivc_ConnectionFail
description: Client failed to connect to voice server

name: ivc_HostUnknown
description: Bad ip address supplied for voice server

name: ivc_NoMicrophone
description: No input device detected by voice client

name: ivc_NoSpeakers
description: No output device detected by voice client

name: powerBits
description: Ownship power bus / generator states, see PowerBits enum for details

name: busPowerBattery
description: True if at least the battery bus is powered

name: busPowerEmergency
description: True if at least the emergency bus is powered

name: busPowerEssential
description: True if at least the essential bus is powered

name: busPowerNonEssential
description: True if at least the non-essential bus is powered

name: mainGenerator
description: True if the main generator is online

name: standbyGenerator
description: True if the standby generator is online

name: jetFuelStarter
description: True if JFS is running, can be used for magswitch

name: avionicsPower
description: True if UFC switch is turned on

name: auxTacanIsAA
description: True if TACAN is set to AA

name: auxTacanIsX
description: True if TaCAN is set to X

name: ufcTacanIsAA
description: True if TACAN is set to AA

name: ufcTacanIsX
description: True if TACAN is set to X

name: trimPitch
description: Value of trim in pitch axis, -0.5 to +0.5

name: trimRoll
description: Value of trim in roll axis, -0.5 to +0.5

name: trimYaw
description: Value of trim in yaw axis, -0.5 to +0.5

name: magDeviationSystem
description: current mag deviation of the system

name: magDeviationReal
description: current mag deviation of the system

name: altBits
description: Various altimeter bits, see AltBits enum for details

name: calType
description: True if calibration in inches of Mercury (Hg), false if in hectoPascal (hPa)

name: pneuFlag
description: True if PNEU flag is visible

name: outerMarker
description: MARKER beacon light for outer marker

name: middleMarker
description: MARKER beacon light for middle marker

name: flying
description: True if player is attached to an aircraft (i.e. not in UI state).

name: blinkBits
description: Cockpit indicator lights blink status, see BlinkBits enum for details. Value is 1 if lamp is blinking

name: blink_OuterMarker
description: Slow flashing for outer marker. Value is 1 if lamp is blinking

name: blink_MiddleMarker
description: Fast flashing for middle marker. Value is 1 if lamp is blinking

name: blink_PROBEHEAT
description: Probeheat system is tested. Value is 1 if lamp is blinking

name: blink_AuxSrch
description: Search function in NOT activated and a search radar is painting ownship. Value is 1 if lamp is blinking

name: blink_Launch
description: Missile is fired at ownship. Value is 1 if lamp is blinking

name: blink_PriMode
description: priority mode is enabled but more than 5 threat emitters are detected. Value is 1 if lamp is blinking

name: blink_Unk
description: Unknown is not active but EWS detects unknown radar. Value is 1 if lamp is blinking

name: blink_Elec_Fault
description: non-resetting fault.  Value is 1 if lamp is blinking

name: blink_OXY_BROW
description: monitor fault during Obogs.  Value is 1 if lamp is blinking

name: blink_EPUOn
description: abnormal EPU operation.  Value is 1 if lamp is blinking

name: blink_JFSOn_Slow
description: Non-critical failure.  Value is 1 if lamp is blinking slow

name: blink_JFSOn_Fast
description: Critical failure.  Value is 1 if lamp is blinking fast

name: blink_ECM_Oper
description: defined in EcmOperStates - system warming up

name: lightBits
description: Cockpit Indicator Lights, one bit per bulb. See enum

name: oxy_BROW
description: Repurposed for eyebrow OXY LOW (was OBS, unused)

name: equip_HOT
description: Caution light; repurposed for cooling fault (was: not used)

name: onGround
description: True if on ground: this is not a lamp bit!

name: eng_FIRE
description: Right eyebrow; upper half of split face lamp

name: hyd
description: Right eyebrow; see also OIL (this lamp is not split face)

name: flcs_ABCD
description: TEST panel FLCS channel lamps; repurposed, was OIL (see HYD; that lamp is not split face)

name: flcs
description: Right eyebrow; was called DUAL which matches block 25, 30/32 and older 40/42

name: autoPilotOn
description: TRUE if is AP on.  NB: This is not a lamp bit!

name: tfr_STBY
description: MISC panel; lower half of split face TFR lamp

name: lightBits2
description: Cockpit Indicator Lights, one bit per bulb. See enum

name: jfsOn
description: Eng Jet Start panel; run light

name: tfr_Engaged
description: MISC panel; upper half of split face TFR lamp

name: gearHandle
description: Lamp in gear handle lights on fault or gear in motion

name: engine
description: Lower half of right eyebrow ENG FIRE/ENGINE lamp

name: lightBits3
description: Cockpit Indicator Lights, one bit per bulb. See enum

name: flcsBitRun
description: FLT CONTROL panel RUN light (used to be Multi-engine fire light)

name: flcsBitFail
description: FLT CONTROL panel FAIL light (used to be Lock light Cue; non-F-16)

name: dbuWarn
description: Right eyebrow DBU ON cell; was Shoot light cue; non-F16

name: noseGearDown
description: Landing gear panel; on means down and locked

name: leftGearDown
description: Landing gear panel; on means down and locked

name: rightGearDown
description: Landing gear panel; on means down and locked

name: parkBrakeOn
description: Parking brake engaged; NOTE: not a lamp bit

name: power_Off
description: Set if there is no electrical power.  NB: not a lamp bit

name: sSpeedBrake
description: True if speed brake is in anything other than stowed position

name: mcAnnounced
description: Master Caution WILL come up in 3sec; turns off when MC light is on

name: mlgWow
description: MLGWOW is only for AFM , it means WOW switches on MLG are triggered

name: nlgWow
description: NLGWOW is only for AFM , it means WOW switches on MLG are triggered
Unused spaces  of the Caution Panel. Not implemented in BMS

name: AllCPLightsOn
description: true if all caution panel lights are on

name: ecmBits
description: see EcmBits enum for details - Note: these are currently not combinable bits, but mutually exclusive states!

name: Flood Console
description: current floodconsole brightness setting, see FloodConsole enum for details

name: isEndFlight
description: True if player is ending the flight from 3D

name: isOverG
description: True if G limits are being exceeded

name: isOnGround
description: True if player a/c is on the ground

name: isExitGame
description: True if player exits the game (2D)

name: gForce
use with: Max7219, TM1637, LCD, OLED, StepperX27, StepperVID

name: eyex
description: Where the eye is in relationship to the plane

name: eyey
description: Where the eye is in relationship to the plane

name: eyez
description: Where the eye is in relationship to the plane

name: SpeedbrakeLeft

description: F18 Fire extiguisher discharge indicator light

description: F18 Fire extiguisher ready indicator light
